description:
Ready to layer up? Prana has got you covered, with their Driggs Crew Sweater - Slim. Check it out, it may be the all-natural, all-season style you’ve been searching for.

The double layer collar gives it an elevated look that pairs just as well with jeans for the weekend as it does with chinos at the office. And with a perfect fabric density, it’s great on its own or with an added jacket for extra warmth.

Speaking of that fabric, take a closer look and you’ll find small flecks of color woven into the fabric. The end result? A cool dimensional look guaranteed to stand the test of trends.
name: Prana Driggs Crew Sweater - Slim - Mens
